author: alintulu
body:
This PR adds the necessary files for running 3 types of inference for Run 3 PFScouting. The 3 models include

- AK4 flavour-tagging
- AK8 b-tagging
- AK8 mass regression

You can find plots over the performance of each model [here](https://docs.google.com/presentation/d/1Z8j1_AmpV1C5U0ImYvcD6OgB7BpT08jATt0sREuYJbY/edit?usp=sharing).

We plan to redo the training for each model as soon as the improved Run 3 sample is ready (hopefully within a month). However as this PR is in combination with another to CMSSW adding a custom Run 3 PFScouting NanoAOD (https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/40438), we would like to include these first versions of the models already now.
title: Add PartcileNet ONNX models for Run 3 PFScouting
